website_summaries.verdict: Hands down the best car trunk organizer you can buy. Cleverly designed with the user in mind.
pros: One of the only models with a strap system to keep it secured and in place
Features convenient compartments for organizing and a lot of extra pocket space
Has comfortable carrying straps, is collapsible, and features a thick fabric construction for durability
cons: Some users found it a little small, but you have the option of connecting multiple units together

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, decent size. Works great in my car trunk. Emergency kit and jumper cables, as well as a tote full of grocery totes. Yes, I have a tote full of totes in my tote. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Zythia13

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It is super well made and fits A TON of stuff. I'm using it basically as an emergency kit. I was able to fit literally anything I need in the event of an emergency, including a change of clothes (with shoes), toiletries, a blanket, makeup, snacks, and I still have room to toss shopping bags in while I'm out so they don't roll around in my trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Strong odor
customer_reviews.text: If I were to put this organizer in my car, I'd be tempted to ride on the roof to get away from its odor. I suppose I could put it outside in the sun for several weeks to see if the odor will dissipate (or get rid of the gophers), but I've lost patience with consumer products that reek upon arrival like this one does. It's going back.
customer_reviews.author: California

customer_reviews.title: A useful thing!
customer_reviews.text: Nice organizer for car. You can keep it in the back or passenger seat of the car. It was useful to store munching items when we went on a long car trip
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: Cargo Trunk Organizer
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my Cargo Trunk Organizer thus far. The delivery was on time, the product has a nice appearance and seems to be of good quality. It keeps things organized and my groceries don't roll around the back of my SUV. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Salas

customer_reviews.title: there was a giant dirty footprint on one of the sides
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for someone, it came in a completely sealed package but when it was opened by the person the gift was intended for;there was a giant dirty footprint on one of the sides!!! I was so embarrassed! Awful to think that was used and then just returned and repackaged. .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mesh pockets are useless
customer_reviews.text: The mesh side pockets are not large enough to store anything that isn't flat without the walls of the organizer collapsing in. Basically defeats the size of this thing; which is huge and took up half of the trunk of my 2018 Subaru Crosstrek. Sent back due to those mesh pockets because it makes the organizer useless for me.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Had for 2 weeks, first time I went to ...
customer_reviews.text: Had for 2 weeks, first time I went to lift it with the inner handles, they both ripped off! Maybe was 20 lbs of weight... Very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.author: todd lee

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit smaller than I thought but ended up being for the better! It fits well in my trunk and holds all my stuff! I love the easy access nets and pockets on the front and side!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but flawed.
customer_reviews.text: Well... I had high hopes for this but.. I'm underwhelmed. Feels pretty rigid and like it will hold up, the pockets are sturdy and don't seem prone to tearing. All that good there is one... I guess awkward flaw. The front section divider snaps into place. Ok so that's not so bad right? The problem is that the buttons on the divider itself were but on backwards and the buttons on the center divider are 2 inches closer to the edge than where the flap connects to the front. Kinda makes for a small awkward uneven pocket in the front that always unsnaps. Might have been better off spending a few extra dollars but it'll do I guess.
customer_reviews.author: T. P.

customer_reviews.title: Good storage organizer
customer_reviews.text: I recently brought three of these organizers from this company. They work great. Some of the others I have tried in the past, don't Have very strong sides, but these do. They hold their shape really Well.
customer_reviews.author: JOHNNEY

customer_reviews.title: The product looks good, HOWEVER...FOOTPRINTS!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to organize items in my truck bed. This product is well built and good size for my truck bed, and has straps to tie it down to the bed. So basically I could recommend this product to anyone who wants to organize a trunk. HOWEVER, as you see in the photos that I uploaded, there are some white footprints and smudges inside the product, which seem to have been stained before packaging. They do not affect its performance at all, but that is definitely unhappy experience to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: We gave my husby's car some good surprise detailing and bought this ahead of that. Let's just say it changed my husby's trunk where he keeps work cables, keyboards etc for installations from chaos to whoaa😲😲 yep! He was shocked when he saw the final look and said he hadnt seen the floor of his trunk in years lol I even found an award he was given at work 4 years ago. This organizer is exactly what we needed, well made, easy to assemble and durable with enough pockets for screw drivers, pens etc. It's a winner, get it!
customer_reviews.author: Ade

customer_reviews.title: so many like this don't measure up
customer_reviews.text: seems fairly well designed but materials could be a little more substantial. difficult to find the right place for it - seem a bit small for cargo areas and a little big in front seat. can collapse down in size, but this seems a little flaky. so many like this don't measure up, but at least this one seems well made even if it's less heavy duty than desired
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what my Honda CRV needed.
customer_reviews.text: First off, this product in person is much sturdier than I thought it might be. It was so easy to clip into my SUV (I have a 2020 Honda CR-V Hybrid and it fits perfectly w/room to spare). It was super easy to adjust the straps (see my video clip). I'm very pleased and this will hold a LOT of stuff. Plus one of the dividers you can move or lay flat if you're not going to use it. There's also a section with a snapping divider that you can unsnap and not use if needed. Lastly, it collapses easily if you need to fit something larger in there. Highly recommend and I'm so glad I found this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT Organizer for COVID-19
customer_reviews.text: I recently traded in my SUV and wanted to get one cargo organiser for the cargo area. I don't write reviews due to lack of time but let me tell you this thing is AWESOME. I took three of my old cargo totes and packed everything into this ONE organizer. One section is for COVID-19 protection with my extra face masks hand wipes paper towels and cleaning supplies to refill my supplies up front. The other part of the organized has my emergency road side and first aid kits umbrella etc for emergencies. The front little pockets hold my flashlight and multitool hammer of my SUV. Looks get, can see everything and just enough room for everything! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: JustaMother

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality, Smaller than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this along with the XL Drive Bin from the same company. Again, I really like the construction value and thought behind these products, but they are just smaller than expected. From the looks of it you'd think it would take up a large amount of trunk space, but in my Ford Taurus I could easily fit three of these. Again, not really an issue and more of my issue for not properly measuring and checking, and I will definitely keep it...but if you think this is a very large spread out trunk organizer you should probably look at the dimensions before deciding it is for you.
customer_reviews.author: J. W. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Only if it came... (UPDATE: It finally came!)
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, but the organizer never even came... Very upset, had to request a refund. Can not reorder.. UPDATE: After going through the steps of requesting a refund I was notified I could no longer do so... BUT! The Amazon virtual assistant was able to reorder the product for the same price I originally purchased, cool! The trunk organizer just came in the mail, and it’s not bad. Went from 1 Star to 3 stars. The only reason why it’s three stars is because I think it could be a little sturdier and maybe a tad bigger, plus some nonslip material on the bottom of the organizer would be nice! But overall for my Honda Accord, it’s work well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t let water or humidity get to it!  Mold and mildew mightmare!
customer_reviews.text: Update: It seems that all of the semi-rigid dividers, bottom, and walls are made of a cardboard like material! I liked this product until it got humid and a little moist. Then the walls curled and became warped and flimsy. I will be looking for a similar item constructed with better materials like plastic inserts instead of the cardboard like material in this thing. Great product!!! Keeps my tools and cooler from sliding around the cab of my truck. It is made of a decent material and I have had no issues with tearing at all.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and versatile
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife's Nissan Versa, for which it was a perfect fit in the hatchback. Recently sold that in exchange for a GMC Acadia, and I'm sad to report that it will now only fit when half-collapsed. But that's a ding on the Acadia, not this product. I like that I was able to continue using it at all, to be honest, because it is indeed adaptable and versatile. So when she folds down one seat in the back of the new car, she can open this thing up all the way to hold more stuff and keep it from sliding around and hitting the passengers. Well made, good buy.
customer_reviews.author: ZacTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Fits beautifully in my little SUV
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for! I just bought a CX-5 and this keeps everything neatly organized in the back. It has a lot of compartments on the side (pockets), and I'm storing my grocery bags in there so I'll always have them when I'm shopping (California requires people to bring their own shopping bags). And, I can't wait until it's watermelon weather because it will be the first time in my life I don't have to listen to the watermelon scooting around the car on the drive home -- the mid-size compartment will hold that perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Lori M. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Included straps are cheap and do not latch reliably
customer_reviews.text: I just finished installing this in my car. My first impression is that this thing feels flimsy - I don't expect it to last more than a couple years. It was frustrating to strap into place. The included straps use a very unreliable "latch" mechanism - this latch pops open when just moving the loose strap around. I ended up having to adjust it to size, rubber band it shut, and clip it to the organizer. Honestly, I wish I had known these would be so useless so I could have just ordered a couple proper ratchet straps.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Sylvis

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a piece broken, exchanging for another one
customer_reviews.text: Giving this 1 star only because one of the tie down straps was already broken when I opened the package. I wanted something to hold groceries in the back of my SUV so they don’t slide all over the place. The organizer arrived quickly and seems to be constructed well but with one of the 2 tie down straps broken it doesn’t do me any good. I’m exchanging this for a new one, I’ll change my rating if the everything arrives as it should be.
customer_reviews.author: mdwebby

customer_reviews.title: Super organized trunk
customer_reviews.text: This trunk storage organizer was a perfect solution for my car. It is large enough to hold several foldable groceries bags, an emergency kit, items for my dog, and safety items for the car. I got the black one which blends in nicely in my trunk. I have an Audi Q5 and it fit perfectly inside the trunk without taking up much space. It is also sturdy enough to hold groceries without tipping over or slipping (the fact that this organizer does not budge when I am driving fast and making quick turns is impressive. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Pretty large storage capacity, nice clips
customer_reviews.text: So this was one of the largest storage units I could find for the price. I was looking for a 25 dollar organizer, and this one seemed to have more pockets, unfold larger, etc etc. I wish the side netting pockets were a little bit bigger...there are a lot of small things in my car that are too big for the nets, but I've filled up the main pockets with coats and emergency equipment. Overall I think it's great. Something to note, this does only fill up about half the space in my dodge charger's trunk. I might look at getting a second unit to fill the gap.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R Pettus III

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Our Audi A7 has a very deep trunk which offers up plenty of room. The problem is that things bounce all over the place if not held with a cargo net or strategically placed. After looking at a bunch of options, I decided to go with two of these, which when placed long-wise, fit perfectly with room to spare. Each storage bundle held plenty of groceries and the straps made it easy to carry everything in all at once. The front pockets are great for extra storage and these are both strong and sturdy. Loved it so much, bought a set for my wife's car as well.
customer_reviews.author: G. Z.

customer_reviews.title: Was sent one with a muddy prints inside.
customer_reviews.text: Product looks decent. Using it in a 2012 camaro. I am very disappointed that I was sent a product that was either previously used or came from manufacturer with a muddy print on the inside of the bag. (As you can see in the photo). I am disappointed that Drive products would send an item out like this.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Livingston

customer_reviews.title: amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love organization and when I saw this product I knew I had to get it! I drive a Honda HRV and have a 12 inch sub and box installed in the "trunk" of it that takes up quite a bit of space. I needed a sturdy structure to hold all of my loose things in, so that they stayed away from puncturing my subwoofer. This product did just that and fits snuggly next to the sub in its fully unfolded form. The storage capacity is amazing and the clips to keep the organizer in place work perfectly. This is by far one of the best purchases I've made in terms of organization. I love it! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emma Payne

customer_reviews.title: Deducted 2 stars for workmanship and quality control
customer_reviews.text: What a simple thing to make right, but when it's wrong it's wrong. The partition that's in one of the large spots is misaligned so only one of the two button snaps will work at a time. See the misalignment of snaps by my thumb. I'm probably not going to send it back because I don't want the hassle of reboxing and waiting. Quality control apparently missed this and it can't be repaired without another snap to put in the correct spot. Other than that it seems good and what I want for organization in suv.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Handshy

customer_reviews.title: Does everything I need AND more!!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend! I have a small Subaru SUV and this works perfect for the back of my car! I didn’t think I would like it but my wife and I use this daily. Has plenty of storage, the pockets on the side are big enough to hold several items and I love having the ability to strap this to my car. The picture was from a weekend trip and we fit 15 bottles of wine in one half of the organizer... So if you REALLY love wine, you could probably fit 30 or more bottles in there haha.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: You need this
customer_reviews.text: This a such a great product. Very well built. It’s stays sturdy and keeps its shape, even after a bunch abuse. It stays in place, and keeps your stuff organized and in place. I mostly have things like jumper cables (The old school heavy duty ones not the flimsy cheep ones they sell now) , toe straps, heavy duty 5k pound ratchet straps, snow brush etc... then I have some smaller stuff like a couple hats and a spare T-shirt in one of the smaller pockets.. you get the idea. This thing can take some abuse, and not lose its shape or let stuff spill into other compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Shackelton

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: So this is a well made product smart looking. One of the really nice things is that it easily compacts to 1/2 size. Compacted it fits on front seat and can be used as a catchall and even a file holder. Expanded it is big and offers lots of space. It has two removable straps that can be used as tie does. I do not think you will find a better one for the price. The material is nice and well sewn. It is not that cheesy vinyl with glued seam ribs that can come unglued when exposed to heat. I think it will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Our small SUV has an open area in back, and groceries just slide around a lot. This really helps. It is nice and sturdy, and has good options for locating different-sized items. On the couple of occasions I've needed to move it, I've seen that it folds up easily! I had thought I'd need to use the included straps to keep it in place, but not so far. I usually have lots of big bags of groceries. So I put the smaller ones, and heavier items, in this organizer, and most of the bigger bags beside it. Then I can turn corners and brake as normal, without things sliding much at all. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Not quite right for my car
customer_reviews.text: This is a a decent cargo storage but.... unless you tie this one down it will slip and slide all over. The last one I owned had a felt like Velcro in the bottom which kept it in place without tie downs. The trunk of my Camry does not have enough anchor points to tie this down without it getting in the way of usable trunk space. Otherwise this is a great product for the price, just didn’t quite work for me. Will probably buy another one with some Velcro on the bottom in the future.
customer_reviews.author: John Leonard

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2018 Hyundai Elantra GT Hatchback and this is EXACTLY what i was looking for! I was hesitant at first because i wasn’t sure it would fit given that my truck space isn’t wide already, but the variety of options this product gives me in terms of how big i want it to be was perfect. I would highly recommend this if you’re someone who loves to keep things clean and organized, or even just looking for something to give you more space than what you have! Already thinking of getting another one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has capabilities beyond being a box with straps
customer_reviews.text: There is a certain intuitive aspect to the design. Since there were no instructions I did the initial setup based on what I could determine about how the product could be configured in different ways. There is a video, I think, but at this stage looking at it will be out of curiosity to see what I missed. What really stood out was that I could locate the organizer in the back of my new Crosstrek and still fit a golf bag in the space between the organizer and the end of the space. Not a large cart or staff bag but my current bag so that's what counts.
customer_reviews.author: J. Michael Jones

customer_reviews.title: Solid, stable, sold!
customer_reviews.text: I researched these trunk organizers way more than I wanted to. I ended up going with this one because I wanted something sturdy. My mom has a different trunk organizer, and I have had one in the past, that were flimsy and would collapse and slides around in the trunk. Not very organized if you ask me. I appreciate this one has the straps to hold it in place with the cargo loops in the trunk. I have a rubber trunk liner and this organizer does NOT slide on it, which is also awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke in less than a week
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this for a week, and one of the straps has already broken. The whole idea is that the thing will stay secured and not fly off my passenger seat. I hope the seller well provide me with a replacement part so that I can continue to use it and hope that it doesn’t break as quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Chadillac

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: I literally opened this in less than 5 minutes and the strap quickly snapped off and broke as I strapped it to my trunk and there was nothing even inside the container at all. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This is a medium size organizer and a pretty good value. I exchanged this organizer to replace a larger one which was sturdier but at almost twice the price. The one flaw that I can see after a few days of use are the straps that are provided. The buckle/clasp does not secure tightly due to the flimsy quality and the straps can be easily pulled and extended even in the closed position. I am ordering a set of straps to replace the ones provided bringing up my total investment by another $15 so in the end, maybe it is not such a 'good value' after all ?
customer_reviews.author: rsy

customer_reviews.title: Cool find!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast!!! Easy storage and holds many things with adjustable compartment sizes. My only complaint is it has a type of smell, so I don’t leave it in my car yet. I want the smell to not be so distinct because when I would leave it in my car my whole car would smell like it. It’s almost like a plastic mixed with acrylic type smell. It is not unbearable, just not ideal. Spray it with febreeze and keep it inside til it loses its brand new smell!
customer_reviews.author: Charity

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy at all
customer_reviews.text: The bottom thread ripped apart in gentle use. By saying gentle use, all I had inside was a portable battery jumper and couple other light equipment and it was sitting inside the trunk for the entire time. I really wanted to like it for its design, but not with this limited sturdiness. Ended up returning it for refund.
customer_reviews.author: doublejay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Lexus RX450h, sturdy, tie downs are a big plus.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product, I originally purchased a cargo storage from a box store and it was junk, my wife told me to return it. Searched on Amazon and found this for around $20.00 (Paid $27.00 for the junk one) and purchased it that day. Arrived and fits perfectly in our 2013 Lexus RX450h, lots of storage and very, very sturdy. Outside pockets are a nice feature and love the tie downs to keep the unit from moving while driving. If you are on the fence about purchasing one, you will not be disappointed in the quality and the features. Very easy to fold and store and this will hold up for many years. Different color options to fit any application
customer_reviews.author: JerrykII

customer_reviews.title: Fits in a tiny car like I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty simple and straight forward. I like the fact the bottom support folds into the design rather than being a separate piece. Plenty of space and pockets. Seems like construction is durable, but that remains to be seen as I've barely had it for a week. The draw for me was the fact that, in compact mode, it fits perfectly in my Miata and holds everything in my trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde C.

customer_reviews.title: Great storage solution - 2018 Ford Mustang GT
customer_reviews.text: My wife got sick and tired of her water bottles and lunch and groceries and everything else in her Mustang's trunk flying around and spilling, so I got her this trunk organizer after reading someone else's positive review on a Mustang forum. It's easy to mount, easy to move out of the way, and does a great job of keeping items in place since it has adjustable straps with hooks to hold it in place. I definitely recommend this, it should fit in any trunk, hatchback, or SUV.
customer_reviews.author: G.B.

customer_reviews.title: Hastily made/ quality not up to par
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to receiving this product especially after I ordered their garbage bin. Unfortunately, I wasn't that impressed. The buttons to snap the divider on mine would not connect and seemed to have been both made with the same [side] buttons so they were not compatible. Also on the side with the storage flap the velcro closures do no line up. Also one is vertical and the other horizontal. It just seemed hastily made. I'd look around because there are lower priced options. I bought this because I thought bought this because I thought the quality was going to be worth the extra money but I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great storage!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I took curves and tried to get something to tumble. Not this bad boy! Heavy coolant containers .. no fall, no slip. I have the side belts hooked up as to stop sliding. There's so much extra space as well. It'll take 30 seconds if I want to remove it, or break it down .. for instance, big luggage, my scooter, or golf clubs .. i just unhook one side and slide it, but still nothing falls out!
customer_reviews.author: Blunt Honesty.

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I contacted the maker/seller through their website and received an incredibly fast response. They sent out a replacement strap the same day. No hassles, no quibbles. Great customer service for a great product! ORIGINAL: Really like this trunk organizer EXCEPT one of the tie down straps' clip mechanism was stuck and wouldn't open. While trying to clip it to the organizer, the plastic broke. Ended up using the broken fastener as a hook but it falls off easily. It's too much hassle to attempt to return and I need to use it now. Will probably use a bungee as a work around. Other than that, it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Ya Ya Queen

customer_reviews.title: Great product and material
customer_reviews.text: Really digging my Drive Trubk organizer. Sturdy. Plent of oockets for smaller items interchangeable divider if you need more space or want to add another storage area in the organizer. I’ve already ordered two more for myself and father in law! Great for storing tools for independent contractors on the go in their own vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed to organize golf stuff
customer_reviews.text: I keep my golf stuff in the back of my truck bed (with a locking cover) and I needed something to consolodate shoes balls and a few other things... this was perfect. I did not need to open it full so I kept it half size which was easy to setup. I like the pockets on it also so I can stuff golf ball sleeves also. I have used the hook to hold it near the rear part of my bed so it is very accessible and it has not slid around at all
customer_reviews.author: K. Bard

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer, larger than seems on photo 🙂
customer_reviews.text: Great trunk organizer. Larger than expected but as it’s mentioned in other reviews, you can collapse and make it smaller. It’s super easy to install, made of good sturdy material & appears washable. Don’t know why amazon turns the photo to sides but I have just placed the organizer in my Sedan, Nissan Centra and as big as it gets it filled about 1/2 of the trunk but like I written before, it is collapsible. All in all, me likes! Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Vladlena Malikova

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't wait to bring my groceries home for the 1st time in my new trunk organizer. Guess what? No groceries flying all over my trunk! Took those turns going home with everything in place. Anybody with a SUV knows what I'm talking bout. Love my SUV, hate my groceries rolling around everywhere. Transported a big bowl of soup home in one compartment, no sloshing around! I LOVE THIS TRUNK ORGANIZER!!!
customer_reviews.author: amnesty

customer_reviews.title: A quality product for daily use, or easily stowed for occasional use.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and as described. This is a quality product. Set up is quick and easy, and the whole thing can be collapsed in seconds to a compact size for storage when not in use. The main divider in the center is fixed, but there is another optional divider on one side that can either be left open or snapped into position to provide a smaller sub-compartment. Pockets on the outside offer even more versatility. I'll be using mine as a full-time organizer to keep the cargo area of my Honda CR-V neat and clutter free.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Wellford

customer_reviews.title: It's been unbelievably useful in keeping bags of groceries and other crap contained ...
customer_reviews.text: ERMERGHERD I should have bought this way sooner! It's been unbelievably useful in keeping bags of groceries and other crap contained in the back of my Suburban. At first I was slightly disappointed that it wasn't quite as big as I had originally envisioned, however after using it for the last couple months, it's perfect. I'm actually amazed at how much stuff this thing will hold. It's not made for industrial type work (duh), but it's great for the back of your grocery-getter and all your rugrats' junk. If you need a way to corral about 10 bags of groceries, or your kid's obnoxious Pokemon collection, this thing has you covered.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Its better to get two or three for groceries
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was lightning quick, especially during the current situation. Organizer looks to be good quality, only time will tell if it will hold up. The size of it is a little underwhelming comparing to the cheap one I got from walmart, it's just about the same size. Wish it did have Velcro on the bottom to stick to the trunk carpet/mat or some other type way to stay put. It does have hooks for anchoring which maybe useful SUVs or if your car has anchor points. It's not that bad of an organizer so I decided to keep it. My car is a 18 scat pack charger with a built in factory sub-woofer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's really a good deal!
customer_reviews.text: I have a small electric car and this organizer is an excellent fit in the back hatchback area! Nicely made, attractive, and very sturdy, this organizer can hold a lot of items. I am using it to keep my charger cord, accessories, and microfiber cloths. There's still so much room for more, such as groceries or items bought at the local store. I like it; it's perfect for my small car!
customer_reviews.author: IH8PhoenixAZ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for camera gear
customer_reviews.text: I'm constantly going on assignment and needing this or that. Often I leave something at home. But I didn't want to store the stuff in my Impreza hatchback, because people steal stuff. With the Drive Auto Products Trunk Organizer, I just dump the microphone and various layers of clothing and gear in. I keep my camera bag with me, but often when shooting sports events or other things, I need more than just a hat to keep the sun at bay. The organizer has a rag, rain gear and other stuff. I love the thing. No more piles.
customer_reviews.author: Mike NemethTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought a net/basket holder and found myself hardly using it! So, I bought this to go in the back of my equinox and it is way better!! The straps help keep it in place where I want it and it now I don’t hear the stuff sliding around when I turn! Definitely recommend buying this, as a mom of boys that always has baseballs, basketballs, helmets, etc., this is a must!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good size, very sturdy, good-looking
customer_reviews.text: Got this to impose a little bit of order in the rear of our Odyssey. Anything short of a tool chest will seem tiny in the hatch area of a minivan, and this is no exception. It'll hold a few grocery bags, and the small pouches on the sides are very handy. The color matches the Odyssey's tan interior perfectly, which was a very nice bonus. It's easy to fold up, but we don't ever do that because we don't need to. It worked extremely well for the local plant sale - it kept everything standing and organized, and carrying it into the backyard saved a bunch of trips. Super useful.
customer_reviews.author: CMK

customer_reviews.title: Nicely organized my in-car office!!
customer_reviews.text: I work from my car and needed something for my trunk that allowed me to easily store board games, DVD's, binders, art supplies and more. This organizer has plenty of storage for the big stuff and ample side pockets for all the small things too. It was easy to setup and everything seems well constructed including the handles and walls. Very happy with this purchase and am kicking myself for not making it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: ludwig222

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new RAV4 and was looking for something to keep all my stuff organized. I tend to 'live' out of my vehicles and wanted something that would hold and organize all my stuff. I picked this DRIVE organizer and am very happy. The size is perfect. Not too big, not too small. The sides are soft but not flimsy. The three partitions work really well for me. I have used this organizer both in the cargo space and in the front seat. I like the ability to anchor the organizer with straps if needed. All in all, this was a great buy and now my Dad wants one.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah B.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Turns out to be what they said it was going to be and what I thought I wanted but it is big. I thought that I would use it to carry stuff from the trunk to the apartment but I use it as a way to keep stuff from flying around the trunk now. Would I but it again, I guess. I really can't think of anything else. My goal was to keep things organized back there. That is what this does. I think the solution is to keep less crap in the trunk.
customer_reviews.author: mmerg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for whatever you want!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect size. Keep in trunk for grocery shopping...one side for milk, juice, salad dressing, oil, beer/wine, other side is for fresh fruit, vegetables, fresh bread, eggs, anything that is delicate. Haven't had a cracked egg, smooshed bread,etc
customer_reviews.author: Willie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my trunk.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. I have this on one half of my trunk and a laundry basket on the other side. In this I keep anything related to my car (gas can, jumper cables, car jack, car washing materials, etc.) Its a really great addition to my trunk. It keeps things from rolling all over without feeling cramped. If I need more room I can remove it and easily put it back in when I need it. My trunk doesn’t have loops to tie it down but I don’t have issues with it sliding so it’s good!
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: They should have used those little carabiner clips instead of hooks. They keep slipping of the mounts. Also cannot tighten them up very well as there is not a short enough adjustment and you are left with a lot of extra nylon strap which I have to twine around the remaining strap to keep it out of the way. Dividers keep coming unsnapped but are a pain to get re-snapped, especially leaning over the bumper of the SUV.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Cheap hardware
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this out of the box. It fit great into my Subaru and solved the storage issue that I was having. However, after just a short time the hardware (clasps) on the straps broke and now I just have to tie it to the anchors that I have in the floor of my trunk because I can't cinch it down now. The storage box itself is great however the mechanisms for keeping it in place are terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Tie Downs Weak
customer_reviews.text: Great quality except for where the tie downs anchor to the middle of the organizer on each side. The anchoring loops are sewn onto the covering only. Any situation where the anchor gets stressed could tear the covering and cause the organzer to break free. The anchoring loops need to be secured completely through the wall and the covering for maximum strength. For the price this is one of the best choices SUV organizers. I am happy with this purchase for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: Mystic Cook

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart quickly
customer_reviews.text: Started falling apart after 6 month of use. I've been using this quite gently, storing backpacks, water bottles, and groceries. After just half a year of use, the middle divider is broken and the cardboard is poking out. The pockets are partially ripped off and the cables are frayed. Looks nice, but quality of materials is total crap.
customer_reviews.author: Vania Smirnov

customer_reviews.title: Space Saver without being Over Sized
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about my trunk organizer. I have plenty of room for everything I keep in my trunk. I have a small car vacuum, laundry detergent and softener, car cleaning supplies, snow removal items and a few other things which al fit in the organizer. It has clips that you can use to hold it in place. I have a Ford Focus and the organizer is large enough for everything to fit in it with room left over for more and I still have trunk space for groceries and such.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, but came damaged.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I returned the first one and ordered a second one. This one came damaged as well. This product is exactly what I have been looking for! It arrived today and I was so excited to get it! The reason I am giving 3 stars is because in the bag when I opened it, one of the prongs for the buckle was broke. So it doesn't buckle properly now:-/
customer_reviews.author: Jerika Remington

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: We liked this organizer so well with bought three in the last couple weeks for a new vehicles. They even had a two package special and that was a nice surprise.I have bought some different ones they were not sturdy and they weren’t waterproof these ones are made from quality product and are waterproof I would recommend these to my family and friends
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this. I have been putting off purchasing this, I'm so happy I finally did. Now I am single and my car screams it. The only readily available seat in my car is the passenger one. I keep my back seats down and utilize for car back for storage and sleeping space on my road trips. I'm currently on one and had this sent to the address where i am staying. Best choice EVER. Well beside getting divorced but that's another story. Just like divorce it's worth every penny. ;)
customer_reviews.author: S Radikal

customer_reviews.title: Straps need work
customer_reviews.text: I have this on the bed of my 2018 Chevy Colorado and it is a good storage organizer. The only thing that this needs work/change is the straps that holds it in place. It is made out of a very bendable hook and the adjuster for how long/how short the straps can be is made out of plastic that is easily pulled. I was adjusting the straps one time and the plastic lock came apart! I thought i broke it but i simply put it back together. Other than these 2 issues, the organizer itself is very useful.
customer_reviews.author: cLovis_ll

customer_reviews.title: Does not meet expectations created by description
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited over this product, especially after reading the reviews, but sadly the product falls woefully short in meeting the need that it advertises. First, one of the straps buckled broke immediately, with barely any tension, and second it is not very sturdy. While one side maintains its rigidity thanks on part to a partition bottom the other side, does not which makes it difficult to hold anything without collapsing if the strap Is snug. I truly was hoping for a product that worked as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Aurelio Ayuso

customer_reviews.title: You probably wont know how you lived without it
customer_reviews.text: I have an upcoming party this weekend and had to get a bunch of bottles of wine, alcohol etc. and then go food shopping. NY just banned plastic bags LAST WEEK. I swear if I didn't purchase this I would have had bottles crushing all the food i bought and rolling around my trunk and back seats. It was just so easy to organize all the fragile stuff in there and they were fully protected. I def. recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Dunleavy

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Top button for the smaller divider broke as I was putting it together. Seems to be a design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Keeps everything in place- will order again
customer_reviews.text: I’d like the bottom and the center divider to maybe be a little sturdier but overall it’s great. I have an SUV and my groceries and what not will slide all around the back if not contained in something. I was actually able to put all of my groceries in it last time and just carry the whole thing in instead of individual bags. I like it and plan to order a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Quality - recommended
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality & great size. Have in the trunk of my Toyota Solara full of Emergency road gear. In the back I put 2 cans of Fix-a-Flat, jumper cables, oil, 1-gallon gas can, 2 flares, workman gloves & a Roll of shop towels. In the front I have a road side tool kit, water, a bag of emergency food, small bag of toiletries. In the side mesh pockets I have garbage bags. I don't have a place to connect the straps so this does shift around a bit but that is OK. Takes up about 1/3 of the trunk. My sister saw it and I got her one for her SUV.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great For Driving Groceries Home
customer_reviews.text: It works great for driving groceries home, because now we don't have things falling over and banging around in the trunk which is a pet peeve for me. It also works great for transporting those holiday casseroles and any dishes of food you have to bring, but we stick a towel under it to block the heat. Only complaint is its not very great for carrying groceries into the house because a handle ripped out after only a few uses, so we just dont do that anymore. But still happy with it overall.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholes

customer_reviews.title: Really like the design
customer_reviews.text: Bought two and they work great in the back of our Rav4. Lots of compartments and pockets to store all those emergency kit items and various tools a guy likes to have on hand when out and about. I really like the handles, makes it easy to lift them out when you need to fill the trunk with a large or bulky load. They seem well made and I've already have them in and out a few times and anticipate they will last for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: TechyNerd

customer_reviews.title: Brought peace and organization to my trunk!
customer_reviews.text: I’m big into the outdoors. I carry A LOT of stuff all the time. I can’t talk this organizer up enough! It has a vast amount of pouches and pockets which provides a plethora of organization options. This thing is currently holding emergency handwarmers, flashlights, ratchet straps, a hammock, rain coat, rain pants, 10+ bungees, store bags, a hat, tie downs for a kayak, 25 ft of rope and MORE with room to spare. Couldn’t be happier as far as organization options go. It has freed up so much room in my trunk! Haven’t had it long enough to vouch for durability but will update down the road!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron A.

customer_reviews.title: The clips!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. There are a lot of choices on Amazon but I settled on this one since it has the clips/hooks to keep it from moving. Works perfect in my 5th Gen 4Runner. The straps are just long enough to attach it to my tie downs on each side of the rear cargo area. I decided to buy this after multiple glass jars fell out when I opened my tailgate and busted on the driveway. This keeps the groceries secure. No more breaks for me.
customer_reviews.author: Barry R.

customer_reviews.title: great organizer
customer_reviews.text: Put in the back of my '18 Macan. The material is heavy duty and the straps clipped into the sides of my vehicle and tightened up nicely. I'm very happy with the way it doesn't move around and the larger pockets hold my first aid and vehicle emergency kit, work boots, hard hat, and the side mesh pockets hold documents, a knife, etc. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: kendall89

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs one
customer_reviews.text: I love this! The organization of this is sooo helpful. Keeps all my emergency goods separate and it’s super sturdy. The straps really help keep it secure so it’s not flying around in the back of your trunk either. I love that I am able to see everything I have back there so I know what I need or replace. A necessity for your car.
customer_reviews.author: Bronte

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and Nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend for his Birthday gift and just assembled it my way that I thought would look nice and put different stuff in it for his birthday gifts. He absolutely loves it and has been looking for one for awhile now and I am happy I purchased this for him because he was using a regular box and stored inside his car. Now he has this for organization for his trunk. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Tara Christine

customer_reviews.title: Loved so much bought a 2nd one
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in 2016 when I got my new car. Its 3 year later & it needs replacing because the handle was coming apart. I searched my purchase history & reordered a replacement because I liked it that much. I got my replacement & it's essentially the same item but with upgraded handles. I think this one looks sturdier & less likely to give me the same handle problem...tho I've had it for 3 years so it's expected as nothing lasts forever.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie-Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer, but cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife to use in the back of her SUV. It works great and she loves it, but the straps that came with the organizer are extremely cheap and flimsy. One broke when I tried to tighten it, and the other popped apart (not broken, but disassembled). I'm going to get a couple small bungee cords or something to use instead and that should suffice, but it's unfortunate that they couldn't do a little better on the straps. Even some bungees would be better. But the organizer itself is really good and my wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M in SC

customer_reviews.title: Great Trunk Organizer
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a sturdy trunk organizer for a long time and I finally found the perfect one. I like all that it has lots of storage pockets. I have a small trunk so the ability to fold it to make it the perfect size for my trunk is amazing. I can even use it in the passenger seat when I am driving alone. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JLove11

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for staying organized!
customer_reviews.text: Looove this! It’s exactly what I needed to keep my trunk organized. I was able to fit two big jugs of wiper fluid and antifreeze, my tire air pump, jumper cables, handheld vacuum, and jack all in this carrier. I don’t have everything just rolling around my trunk now which is great! Even without using the clips on the sides it stays in place really well. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect price & great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Cadillac xt5 SUV and they do make a cargo organizer from the dealer but it’s like $150. I found this and it’s PERFECT. It does have straps to secure it to the sides of the vehicle but I haven’t even needed to use them. It has plenty of pockets, 3 big sections and folds to barely anything when not in use. Although we keep it expanded all the time. We always keep a towel, change of clothes and first aid kit in one section, then the other 2 are open to throw grocery bags in so your stuff doesn’t go rolling all over the place!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Strap cheaply
customer_reviews.text: The strap that goes around the bag is extremely poorly made. Opened package up put strap around bag and bam the strap broke the bag is not bad though the strap and stuff are horrible.. Not sure now how the bag will hold up after only 30 seconds of a strap
customer_reviews.author: 100%Truth teller/opinion

customer_reviews.title: It's a good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for over a year and it's taken some light abuse from a big move, to camping, hiking, long distance drives. It's held up extremely well and isn't flimsy except for the little dividers inside the unit itself. Not a big deal as this unit is currently holding detailing supplies, rags and an extinguisher.
customer_reviews.author: Livi Harkless

customer_reviews.title: Great for trunk or in the back seat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother in law. She is in her 80s and has problems with items sliding all over her trunk. This organizer is perfect and lightweight. She clips it to an area in her trunk and her small amount of groceries stays in place. She also puts it in her back seat on occasion. This is a great alternative to the boxes she had in her trunk as it stays in place. The boxes slid all over!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Condon

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product, except one tiny thing
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this and it's nearly perfect. The snaps on the small inside flap divider are not very robust and comes unsnapped too easily. But that really has no bearing on this organizer. I have to say I love that I can use half of it while the other half is tucked away perfectly. Then when I need a larger amount of space it's instantly double in size. Brilliant organizer! Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: PBV

customer_reviews.title: Terrific organizer
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased a large pickup truck. Love the truck, lot's of storage and passenger comfort. I bought two of these for the rear bed, hooked them to the side rails, and appreciate how well they hold our groceries without any tipping. I plan to buy another to have behind the driver's seat to keep the more immediate loose stuff from moving around (no, not the kids).
customer_reviews.author: bruspell

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: My trunk was an awful mess and I didn’t think everything would fit in it. Well, I was wrong! There is plenty of room to fit all my stuff and I actually have space in my trunk and can see the carpet lol The only thing I couldn’t fit was my tennis racket and large ice scraper, but I’m super satisfied with this organizer!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I use this a lot in my truck for so many things. Eventually, after a few months, one of the snaps on the divider started ripping away from the fabric. Other than that, it is a great way to hold various things that you don't want flying around your car. It's my go to device when I drive into down for fast food and don't want the items flying off the seat when I stop. Other than the recent issue with the snap, it is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Carl H.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing car organizer worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this organizer! Bought it so I could organize my car trunk because I had a million things in there & this organizer is prefect for the job. It has nice pockets on the outside that can hold several items, & it comes with hooking belts that can attach to anything in the trunk or car seat to keep it steady (I didn't need the belts for my trunk though, the organizer is steady on it's own and doesn't move when I drive). Definitely worth every penny :)
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Spacious, good material, but not sturdy as I thought
customer_reviews.text: The Cargo trunk organizer did it's job for me. It gave me lots of room for organizing my cleaning supplies, first aid kit, phone accessories, and other miscellaneous things I may need. Aside from that, I would have preferred clips over hooks, though. I sometimes have trouble keeping the organizer hooked down. Also, I thought the walls would be thicker or stronger than they are. Overall, I glad I purchased this organizer and I hope it will last me for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco F.

customer_reviews.title: Great for our Jeep
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a life saver for our jeep that has high open trunk. Before, all groceries and anything really you put in the back would always slide around and I kept complaining that my sedan is better for shopping as it holds things better. Now with this organizer - the issue is solved. I can put from bottles to grocery bags and anything in between and it hold items in place, makes it easy at the end of the day open trunk and take all items out. If you have issues with items sliding around your trunk - this is the item for to own!
customer_reviews.author: Zaneta

product_meta.title: Drive Auto Products Car Cargo Trunk Organizer, Folding Compartments Are Easily Expandable To Suit Any In-vehicle Organization Needs, Secure Tie-down Strap System, Made Of Durable Oxford Fabric (Black)
feature_bullets: PATENT PENDING NEW RELEASE to help the car lovers in your life organize their trunk this winter! A perfect automotive organizer christmas gift for new drivers or a road trip!

Revolutionary Tie-Down Strap System from DRIVE is solving the headache of loose clutter, plus a collection of other features designed to address trouble areas where other models fail such as flimsy sides and bases that cave in, slipping and sliding bottoms, lack of pockets or unfriendly size adjustment small to large

BONUS: "Strap In" using optional tie downs that hook into your trunk like an SUV cargo net, around your seat backs, or onto your backseat child safety seat anchors so that your belongings stay securely in place. Fill the gap between the seats with your own personal office, cup holder and do it all work caddy!

BENEFITS: To keep it upright & sturdy every panel is reinforced with stiff base plates - 13 total! Front Seat Mode is ideal for the business or solo traveler by fitting securing in the passenger seat, while strapped around seatback so that nothing moves during vehicle braking

FEATURES: Premium Oxford 600D Fabric, 2 Big Front Pockets, Fully Wrapped Ridged Panels Hold Coffee Mugs / Water Bottles, 8 Side Pockets, Folding Compartments to Fit Work Folders, Tablet, Phones, Binders, or in the Truck for Tools, Pet Supplies and More!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars11,982 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
